title: Cypher Query Resource Schema
description: Schema for Cypher query resources with metadata extracted from query parsing

node_labels.description: List of node labels accessed in the query (e.g., Customer, Transaction, Account, SAR)

relationship_types.description: List of relationship types accessed in the query (e.g., OWNS, SENT_TXN, TO_ACCOUNT)

max_depth.description: Maximum traversal depth (number of hops) in the query

has_aggregations.description: Whether the query contains aggregation functions

path_variables.description: List of path variable names used in the query

has_where_clause.description: Whether the query has a WHERE clause

has_order_by.description: Whether the query has an ORDER BY clause

has_limit.description: Whether the query has a LIMIT clause

estimated_nodes.description: Estimated number of nodes that might be returned

estimated_edges.description: Estimated number of edges that might be returned

risk_rating.description: Risk rating extracted from query filters (e.g., 'high', 'medium', 'low')

transaction_amount.description: Transaction amount extracted from query filters

transaction_amount_min.description: Minimum transaction amount extracted from query filters

transaction_amount_max.description: Maximum transaction amount extracted from query filters

pep_flag.description: PEP (Politically Exposed Person) flag extracted from query filters

severity.description: Severity level extracted from query filters

customer_team.description: Customer team extracted from query filters (Phase 3: ABAC)

customer_region.description: Customer region extracted from query filters (Phase 3: ABAC)
